mean_cn: adj.平等的；相等的；  v.比得上；  n.同等的人
mean_en: having the same rights or being treated the same as other people, without differences such as race, religion or sex being considered
sentence: Today, men and women are equal in the eyes of the law.
sentence_trans: 如今，男女在法律面前是平等的。
word_etyma: equ相等，平均 + al形容词后缀 → 相等的，平等的
